keeping it a secret for a long time!<stop_lip_animation n02051 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63797.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02051 _normal m00001>「へへっ。びっくりしただろ？
　ずっと　ナイショにしてたんだぜ！<stop_lip_animation n02051 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63797.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02051 _normal m00001>: 헤헷, 깜짝 놀랐지?
　그동안 비밀로 했었어!<stop_lip_animation n02051 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63797.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02051 _normal m00001>哈哈。大吃一惊吧？
我们一直对你保密来着！<stop_lip_animation n02051 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63797.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02051 _normal m00001>嘿嘿！大吃一驚吧？
我們一直對你保密呢！<stop_lip_animation n02051 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63798.en:
<start_lip_sync n02050 _normal m00001>The Queen said she was throwing a party
for you. We've been secretly preparing
for it.<stop_lip_animation n02050 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63798.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02050 _normal m00001>「女王様が　あなたのために
　パーティーをしようって　言ってね。
　みんなで　こっそり準備してたのよ。<stop_lip_animation n02050 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63798.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02050 _normal m00001>: 여왕님이 널 위해
　파티를 열자고 그랬거든.
　다 같이 몰래 준비한 거야.<stop_lip_animation n02050 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63798.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02050 _normal m00001>女王大人说要为你
召开欢迎会。
所以大家一起悄悄做了准备。<stop_lip_animation n02050 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63798.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02050 _normal m00001>女王陛下說要為你
舉行一場歡迎會嘛，
大家就一起偷偷準備了。<stop_lip_animation n02050 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63799.en:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>Wow... That's great! Did you guys
prepare all this?<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63799.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>「わぁ……　すごい！
　これ　みんな　キミたちが用意したのかい？<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63799.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>: 와아…… 멋지다!
　이걸 다 너희가 준비한 거니?<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63799.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>哇……真厉害！
这些都是你们准备的吗？<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63799.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>哇……好棒！
這些都是你們大家準備的嗎？<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63800.en:
It was the first time for me to make sweets by myself, so I'm not sure if they turned out delicious or not.
Everyone helped me.
63800.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>「自分でお菓子を作るなんて　はじめてだったから
　おいしくできたか　自信ないけれど……。
　みんな　手伝ってくれましたの。<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63800.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>: 직접 과자를 만들어 본 건 처음이라
　맛이 있을지 자신은 없지만…….
　모두 도와줬어.<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63800.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>我是第一次做点心，
对味道没什么信心……
不过大家都给我帮忙了。<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63800.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>我是第一次做點心，
也不太確定好不好吃……
不過大家有幫我一起做。<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63801.en: <start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>And I also have a present for you.<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63801.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>「それから　あなたに
　プレゼントも　ありますのよ。<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63801.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>: 그리고 당신을 위한
　선물도 있어.<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63801.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>另外，我们还为你
准备了礼物。<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63801.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>另外，我們還為你
預備了禮物。<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63802.en:
<start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>This rosary is from the Town of Celed.
It is a symbol of our bond as members
of the Children's Kingdom.<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63802.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>「このロザリオは　セレドの町の……。
　子供の国の一員としての　絆の証ですわ。<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63802.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>: 이 로사리오는 셀레도 마을의…….
　어린이 왕국의 일원이라는 유대감의 증표야.<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63802.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>这个念珠是你成为塞莱德镇的……
成为孩子王国成员的标志，是羁绊的证明。<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63802.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>這條念珠是你成為塞萊德鎮……
成為孩子王國一員的標誌，是情誼的證明。<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63803.en: <start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>...Is this another one of your handiwork?<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63803.ja: <start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>「……これも　キミたちの　手作りなのかい？<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63803.ko: <start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>: ……이것도 너희가 직접 만든 거니?<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63803.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>……这个也是你们自己做的？<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63803.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>……這個也是你們自己做的嗎？<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63804.en:
I know that there will be hard times when your parents are not around, but when that happens, look at this rosary
and remember that you have us, your companions.
63804.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>「ご両親がいなくて　つらい時もあると思うけれど
　そんな時は　このロザリオを見て
　私たちという仲間がいることを　思いだして。<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63804.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>: 부모님이 안 계셔서 힘들 때도 있겠지만
　그럴 땐 이 로사리오를 보고
　우리 같은 동료가 있다는 걸 떠올려 봐.<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63804.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>你失去了父母，一定会有难过的时候吧。
那时你就看看这个念珠，
想着你还有我们这群伙伴。<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63804.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>你失去了雙親，一定也會有難過的時候，
那時你就看看這條念珠，
想著還有我們這些夥伴吧。<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63805.en:
<start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>As long as we have this bond, you will
always be our precious companion.<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63805.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>「この絆がある限り　あなたは
　いつだって　私たちの大切な仲間よ。<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63805.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>: 이 유대감이 있는 한, 너는
　언제나 우리의 소중한 동료야.<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63805.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>只要我们还联系在一起，
你永远都是我们重要的伙伴。<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63805.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>只要有這個情誼在，
你就永遠是我們的夥伴。<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63806.en:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>Thank you. This is the first time in
my life that I have received such
heartfelt hospitality.<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63806.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>「ありがとう……。こんなに　心のこもった
　もてなしを受けたのは　生まれて　はじめてだ。<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63806.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>: 고마워……. 이렇게 진심이 담긴
　대접을 받는 건 태어나서 처음이야.<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63806.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>谢谢……有生以来，
还是第一次受到这么真诚的款待。<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63806.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>謝謝你們……這是我有生以來
第一次受到這麼真誠的款待。<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63807.en:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>As a token of my appreciation to all
of you, I would like to present you
with a song.<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63807.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>「みんなへの　感謝のしるしに
　一曲　プレゼントさせてもらうよ。<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63807.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>: 모두에게 감사하는 마음을 담아
　한 곡 선물할게.<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63807.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>为了表示对大家的感谢，
我就弹一首曲子作为礼物吧。<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63807.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>為了表示對大家的感謝，
我就彈一首曲子送給大家吧。<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63808.en:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>Thank you, everyone. It's been a long
time since I've played Torban with
such a clear mind.<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63808.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>「ありがとう　みんな。
　こんな　晴れ晴れとした気持ちで
　トゥーラを弾くのは　本当に　ひさしぶりだよ。<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63808.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>: 모두들 고마워.
　이렇게 기분 좋게
　툴라를 연주한 건 정말 오랜만이야.<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63808.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>谢谢各位，
我好久没有这么开心地
弹过图拉琴了。<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63808.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>謝謝大家。
我真的已經好久沒有
這麼開心地彈過圖拉琴了。<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63809.en:
Until recently, I was afflicted with a horrifying disease that gradually petrifies me from the tips of my hands
and feet.
63809.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>「僕は　つい最近まで　手足の先から
　だんだん石化してしまうという
　おぞましい病気に　かかっていてね。<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63809.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>: 난 아주 최근까지 손발의 끝부분부터
　점점 돌처럼 굳어 버리는
　무서운 병을 앓았거든.<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63809.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>我直到最近为止还一直在生病，
一种会从指尖和脚尖开始
慢慢变成石头的，可怕的病。<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63809.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>其實我到不久前為止還一直在生病，
那個疾病很可怕，會從指尖和腳尖開始
慢慢變成石頭。<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63810.en:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>I couldn't even stand up, let alone
play the Torban, and I spent my days
cursing God for giving me this fate.<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63810.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>「トゥーラを弾くどころか　立つこともできなくて
　僕に　こんな運命を与えた神様を
　呪いながら　日々　過ごしていたんだ。<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63810.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>: 툴라 연주는커녕 일어설 수조차 없어서
　나에게 이런 운명을 내린 신을
　저주하며 매일을 보냈어.<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63810.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>不要说弹图拉琴了，连自己站起来
都不可能。我每天都在诅咒为我
安排了这种命运的神明。<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63810.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>別說是彈圖拉琴了，我連站都無法站。
我每天都在詛咒
讓我遭遇這種命運的神明。<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63811.en:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>...But when I came to this world, that
illness disappeared without a trace. I
can play Torban again.<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63811.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>「……でも　こっちの世界に来たら
　そんな病気は　跡形もなく　消えさっててね。
　また　トゥーラが弾けるようになったんだよ。<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63811.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>: ……하지만 이쪽 세계로 왔더니
　그 병은 흔적도 없이 사라졌더라.
　다시 툴라를 연주할 수 있게 된 거야.<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63811.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>……但是，来到这边的世界之后，
我的症状都消失了。
我又能弹图拉琴了。<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63811.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>……但是，來到這個世界以後，
我的病狀卻消失得無影無蹤，
我又能繼續彈圖拉琴了。<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63812.en: <start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>Hey... I'm really dead, aren't I?<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63812.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>「なぁ……　僕って
　本当は　死んでるんだろう？<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63812.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>: 저기…… 나 말이야.
　사실은 죽은 거지?<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63812.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>那个……其实我
已经死了吧？<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63812.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>那個……我其實
已經死了吧？<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63813.en:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>...I knew it. I guess my dream of winning
the Gran Zedora Music Festival will
not come true anymore.<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63813.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>「……やっぱり　そうか。
　グランゼドーラの音楽祭で　優勝する夢は
　もう　かなわないんだね。<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63813.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>: ……역시 그렇구나.
　그랑제도라의 음악제에서 우승하겠다는 꿈은
　이제 이룰 수 없어.<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63813.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>……果然是这样啊。
我想在古兰泽朵拉的音乐节上
获胜的梦想已经无法实现了啊。<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63813.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>……我就知道。
要在古蘭澤朵拉音樂節上奪冠的夢想
也無法實現了啊。<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63814.ja: <start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>「あ　あの……。<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63814.ko: <start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>: 저, 저기…….<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63815.en:
But I don't care about that. I'd rather be able to play as many songs as I want here than suffer from
illness and not be able to move my fingers.
63815.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>「でも　そんなこと　どうでもいいよ。
　病気で苦しんで　指先も動かせない人生より
　ここで　好きなだけ　曲が弾けるほうがいい。<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63815.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>: 하지만 그런 건 상관없어.
　병에 고통받고 손가락도 못 움직이는 삶보다
　여기서 마음껏 연주하는 게 더 좋아.<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63815.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>不过已经无所谓了。
比起被病痛折磨得连指尖都无法动弹的生活，
我还是觉得能在这里随心所欲地弹曲子比较好。<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63815.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>不過，那種事也無所謂了。
比起那種被病痛折磨，連手指都無法動彈的人生，
還是能在這裡盡情彈琴比較好。<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63816.en:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>There are people who are pleased with
my performance, and I couldn't be
happier. Thank you all so much today!<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63816.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>「僕の演奏で　よろこんでくれる人もいるし
　これ以上の幸せは　ないよ。
　みんな　今日は　本当にありがとう！<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63816.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>: 내 연주를 기뻐해 주는 사람도 있으니
　이보다 더한 행복은 없어.
　모두 오늘 정말 고마워!<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63816.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>而且还有人会因为我的演奏而快乐，
没有什么比这更幸福的了。
各位，今天真是谢谢你们了！<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63816.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>而且還有人會因為我的演奏而開心，
沒有什麼比這更幸福的了。
各位，今天真的謝謝你們了！<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63817.en:
Thank you very much for your wonderful performance. Now that we have plenty of snacks, let's enjoy today to the
fullest!
63817.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>「こちらこそ　すばらしい演奏を　ありがとう。
　さあ　おやつも　たくさんあることだし
　今日は　思いっきり　楽しみましょう！<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63817.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>: 우리야말로 멋진 연주를 들려 줘서 고마워.
　자, 간식도 많이 있으니까
　오늘은 실컷 즐겨 보자!<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63817.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>我们才应该说谢谢，谢谢你为我们演奏那么
动听的曲子。来吧，我们有很多点心，
今天就来玩个痛快吧！<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63817.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>我們才該謝謝你為我們演奏這麼動聽的曲子。
來吧，這裡有很多點心，
今天就來玩個痛快吧！<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>

The <pc>s had a great time
at Selik's welcome party.
88924.ja:

楽しいひとときを　過ごした。

<pc>一行在塞利克的欢迎会上

88924.zh-Hant:
<pc>一行人在塞利克的歡迎會上
度過了愉快的時光。

63818.en:
<start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>Thanks to you, Selik's welcome party
went off without a hitch. Now, please
accept this.<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63818.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>「おかげさまで　セリクの歓迎パーティーは

　さあ　こちらを　お受け取りください。<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63818.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>: 덕분에 셀리크의 환영 파티를

　자, 이거 받으세요.<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63818.zh-Hans:

63818.zh-Hant:

63819.en:
<start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>He was aware of his death, wasn't he?
I was a little surprised, but relieved
that he did not seem too depressed.<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63819.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>「彼は　自分の死に　気づいていたんですね……。
　ちょっと　おどろきましたけれど
　あまり落ち込んでいない様子で　安心しました。<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63819.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>: 셀리크는 자신의 죽음을 알고 있었군요…….
　조금 놀라기는 했지만
　너무 충격받지는 않은 것 같아 안심했어요.<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63819.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>他已经发现自己死了啊……
虽然有点吃惊，
不过看他没有太沮丧，我也就安心了。<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63819.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>原來他已經發現自己死了啊……
看他有點吃驚
卻沒有太沮喪的樣子，我就放心了。<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63820.en:
<start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>By the way, I heard that you met
Selik's parents in the Town of Celed
over there. How did they seem?<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>「ところで　向こうのセレドの町で
　セリクのご両親に　お会いしたようですわね。
　どんな　ご様子でしたの……？<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63820.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>: 그런데 저쪽 셀레도 마을에서
　셀리크의 부모님을 만나셨죠?
　어떻게 지내시던가요……?<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63820.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>你在另一个塞莱德镇
见到塞利克的父母了吧。
他们……怎么样？<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63820.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>對了，你在另一個塞萊德鎮
見到塞利克的父母了吧。
他們看起來還好嗎……？<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<pc> described what he had
seen in the Town of Celed in True

{pc}|hpp(은,는) 진짜 렌더시아에 있는

63821.zh-Hans:

63821.zh-Hant:

塞萊德鎮所看到的事。

63822.en:
<start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>What? Selik was in the Town of Celed
over there?<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63822.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>「えっ……！？　向こうのセレドの町にも
　セリクが　いたですって！？<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63822.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>: 네……!? 저쪽 셀레도 마을에도
　셀리크가 있었다고요!?<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63822.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>诶！在另一个塞莱德镇
也有塞利克？！<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63822.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>什麼……！？你說在那個塞萊德鎮
也有塞利克！？<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63823.en:
<start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>Still unconscious in the clinic? So
Selik is still alive?<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>「施療院で　意識を失ったまま？
　それじゃあ　セリクは
　まだ　生きているの……？<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63823.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>: 의료소에서 의식을 잃은 채로요?
　그렇다면 셀리크가
　아직 살아 있다는……?<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63823.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>他在诊疗院昏睡不醒？
这么说，
塞利克还活着？<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63823.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>在施療院昏睡不醒？
意思是，塞利克他還活著嗎……？<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63824.en:
<start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>...I'm going to go back to my room to
think about something. Thank you for

63824.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>「……ちょっと　考えたいことがあるから

63824.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>……我想思考一些事，

<start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>……我要想些事情，
就先回房裡了。
今天很謝謝你。<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63825.en:
...I knew something was wrong when I woke up from sleep on the way to Town of Celed and realized that I was cured of
an illness that was supposed to be incurable.
63825.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>「……セレドの町へ来る道中　眠りから覚めて
　治らないはずの病が　治ったと気づいた時から
　なんとなく　おかしいとは思っていたんだ。<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63825.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>: ……셀레도 마을로 오는 길에 잠에서 깨자
　나을 리가 없던 병이 나은 걸 깨달았을 때부터
　왠지 이상하다고는 생각했어.<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63825.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>……在来塞莱德镇的路上，
醒来发现自己的不治之症已经痊愈的时候，

63825.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>……在來塞萊德鎮的路上，當我醒過來，
發現自己的不治之症已經好了的時候，
我就覺得很奇怪。<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63826.en:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>My disease is incurable and will
eventually kill me. I knew in advance
that I wouldn't live very long.<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63826.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>「僕の病気は　いずれ死に至る　不治の病……。

63826.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>: 내 병은 결국 죽게 되는 불치병…….
　그리 오래 살지 못하리란 건
　일찍부터 알고 있었어.<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63826.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>我的病是绝症，迟早会死……

63826.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>我的病是絕症，遲早會死……

63827.en:
Well, I don't care that I'm dead. I can play Torban as long as I want, even though I couldn't stand up and
walk.
63827.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>「まあ　死んだことなんて　どうでもいいさ。
　立って歩くことも　できなかった僕が

63827.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>: 사실 죽은 건 상관없어.
　서서 걷지도 못했던 내가
　마음껏 툴라를 연주할 수 있게 됐는걸.<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63827.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>死了其实也无所谓。
我本来连站都站不起来，
现在却能随心所欲地弹琴了。<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63827.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>不過，死了其實也無所謂，
因為我原本連站都無法站，
現在卻能隨心所欲地彈琴了啊。<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63828.en:
...I need to get some practice in, so maybe you can leave me alone. It's hard to concentrate when you're
watching me.

<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>「……練習に打ち込みたいから
　そろそろ　ひとりにしてくれるかな？
　見られていると　集中できないんだ。<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63828.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>: ……연습에 몰두하고 싶은데
　그만 나가 주겠니?
　누가 쳐다보면 집중이 안 되거든.<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63828.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>……我想专心练习，
可以让我一个人待着吗？
有人看着，我就无法集中精神。<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63828.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02199 _normal m00001>……我想專心練習，
可以讓我一個人待著嗎？
有人看著，我就沒辦法集中精神。<stop_lip_animation n02199 CLOSE_MOUTH>
